name: BarcodeTest
description: Unit tests for barcode generation and validation in the BaseFaker class.

test_cases.name: type
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of barcode types and ensures they match the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: testEan13
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of EAN-13 barcodes and ensures they match the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: testGtin13
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of GTIN-13 barcodes and ensures they match the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: testEan8
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of EAN-8 barcodes and ensures they match the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: testGtin8
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of GTIN-8 barcodes and ensures they match the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: testGtin14Length
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of GTIN-14 barcodes and ensures they match the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: testGtin12Length
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of GTIN-12 barcodes and ensures they match the expected pattern.

test_cases.name: testGtin12CheckSum
test_cases.description: Tests the checksum validation of GTIN-12 barcodes.

test_cases.name: testGtin14CheckSum
test_cases.description: Tests the checksum validation of GTIN-14 barcodes.

test_cases.name: testEan8CheckSum
test_cases.description: Tests the checksum validation of EAN-8 barcodes.

test_cases.name: testEan13CheckSum
test_cases.description: Tests the checksum validation of EAN-13 barcodes.
